name: Najah Safiya
short_description: Najah Safiya ERC20 aims to put a fun utilitarian twist on the standard crypto coin.
description: Primary goal of the Najah Safiya (NS7) Project is to function as a coin used in a specific android/iphone game (currently un-named however thought to be eponymous in part, i.e. projected to be available on Google Play and Apple iTunes apps. The coin (NS7) will also function as a standard coin tradable on various exchanges for other cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, 0x, Stellar Lumens, Salt, BAT, etc.
